title: ZDI-CAN-3233: Advantech
content: A CVSS score 9.3 (AV:N/AC:M/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C) severity vulnerability discovered by 'Anonymous' was reported to the affected vendor on: 2015-09-17, 7 days ago. The vendor is given until 2016-01-15 to publish a fix or workaround. Once the vendor has created and tested a patch we will coordinate the release of a public advisory.
